sentences.en: Bernard Show was the foremost playwright of his time.
sentences.cn: 萧伯纳是他那个时代最重要的戏剧作家.

sentences.en: Economic concerns are foremost on many voters’ minds.
sentences.cn: 经济是许多选民关心的首要问题。

sentences.en: He is our foremost leader.
sentences.cn: 他是我们的重要领导人.

sentences.en: He was a singer, but first and foremost a scholar.
sentences.cn: 他是个歌手, 但他主要是一位学者.

sentences.en: He was first and foremost a fiery orator in the 19 th century mold.
sentences.cn: 他却是19世纪中期首屈一指的富于热情的雄辩家.

sentences.en: He was first and foremost a scholar.
sentences.cn: 首先,他是一位学者.

sentences.en: He's written many different kinds of things, but he's first and foremost a novelist.
sentences.cn: 他写过许多不同性质的东西, 但他首先是位小说家.

sentences.en: I have always one foremost satisfaction in reading your books.
sentences.cn: 读你的作品永远给我一种最高的满足.

sentences.en: I have been enjoying my new role with the Mariners but Chongqing put together an appealing proposal that first and foremost gave me the opportunity to coach again.
sentences.cn: 我也非常喜欢我在中央海岸水手俱乐部的新角色，但是重庆让我盛情难却，但是第一位和最重要的是给了我重执教鞭的机会。

sentences.en: I see myself, first and foremost, as a working artist.
sentences.cn: 我首先还是把自己看作一名艺术工作者。

sentences.en: one of the country’s foremost authorities on chemical warfare
sentences.cn: 该国化学战方面的最高权威之一

sentences.en: Rostropovich was long considered the world’s foremost cellist.
sentences.cn: 长期以来，罗斯特罗波维奇一直被视为世界上首屈一指的大提琴家。

sentences.en: Someone jumped out from the foremost waggon and cried aloud.
sentences.cn: 有人从最前面的一辆大车里跳下来,大声叫嚷.

sentences.en: Someone jumped out from the foremost waggon.
sentences.cn: 有人从最前面的一辆马车里跳下来。

sentences.en: The enemy attacked our foremost position all night.
sentences.cn: 敌人攻打了我们的前沿阵地整整一夜.

sentences.en: The first and foremost thing is to let people fall in love with the city at first sight, attracting them by its unique image.
sentences.cn: 首先要着手做的第一件事，也是最重要的事情就是让人们对这个城市一见钟情，以城市自己独特的形象吸引他们。

sentences.en: The foremost of these is other people.
sentences.cn: 这其中最重要的就是身边的人。

sentences.en: The premier occupies the foremost place in the world of politics.
sentences.cn: 首相是政界的首要人物.

sentences.en: the world's foremost authority on the subject
sentences.cn: 该学科全世界首屈一指的权威

sentences.en: Who is foremost in line for a promotion raise?
sentences.cn: 谁晋级加薪排在最前面?

sentences.en: Work therefore is desirable, first and foremost, as a preventive of boredom.
sentences.cn: 因此人们愿意工作, 首先是工作可以防止无聊感.

trans.tran_cn: 最重要的(地)，第一流的(地)
第一流的，最重要的，最初的，最前面的
trans.tran_en: in a leading position among a group of people or things
